text:
# About Jackie Robinson
On April 15, 1947, Jackie Robinson became the first African American to play Major League Baseball in the modern era. He would later become the first African American named a vice president at a fortune 500 company; serve as an advisor to politicians; start a bank and a housing development company; and, was a key figure in advancing equal opportunity and first-class citizenship for all Americans during the Civil Rights Movement of the 1950s and 60s. Hailed a “..freedom rider before freedom rides,” Robinson’s name has become synonymous with breaking barriers.
### Early Life and Gateway into Sports
Jackie Robinson was born on January 31, 1919, in Cairo, Georgia, the son of a sharecropper and the grandson of former slaves. Young Jackie grew up in Pasadena, California, raised by a single working mother of five. After graduating from Pasadena Junior College, Jackie attended the University of California Los Angeles. A star athlete, Jackie became the university’s first four-sport letter winner, excelling in football, basketball, track and field, and baseball. After leaving UCLA, he served in the U.S. Army during World War II, but was court marshalled and honorably discharged for standing up for his rights and refusing to move to the back of a segregated military bus.
In 1944, upon returning home from the military, Jackie Robinson set his sights on joining baseball’s Negro Leagues and began playing shortstop for the Kansas City Monarchs. In 1945, opportunity beckoned when Branch Rickey, the general manager of the Brooklyn Dodgers, invited Robinson to become the first African American to play with the all-white Dodgers’ farm team, the Montreal Royals. Anticipating the great adversity that Robinson would face as he integrated modern baseball, Rickey professed he needed a player who could bear the torment, famously telling Robinson he was “looking for a ballplayer with guts enough not to fight back.”
### An Unprecedented Career in the Major League
### An Unprecedented Career in the Major League
On April 15, 1947, Jackie Robinson stepped onto Ebbets Field for his first game with the Brooklyn Dodgers. It was the beginning of an unparalleled career in baseball. At the end of his explosive nine years as a Dodger, his record included a .311 batting average, 137 home runs, 734 runs batted in, and 197 stolen bases. In 1955, he helped the Dodgers beat the New York Yankees to win their first World Series Championship. Robinson took home the Rookie of the Year Award in 1947, the Most Valuable Player Award in 1949, and in 1962 became the first African American inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame.
### The Fight for First Class Citizenship for All
### The Fight for First Class Citizenship for All
After integrating baseball, Robinson became a full-fledged leader in the Civil Rights movement. He used his celebrity status to further human rights and endeavored to change the landscape of race relations in the United States. Upon retiring from the game in 1957, Robinson was hired to serve as the Vice President for Personnel at Chock Full O’Nuts, the first African American to be named a Vice President of a major American company. He used his position at Chock Full O’ Nuts to improve working conditions for employees. 
An active member of the NAACP, Robinson was often a featured speaker at civil rights rallies including the famed March on Washington in 1963, and frequently participated in picket lines. As a nationally syndicated columnist for the New York Post and New York Amsterdam News, Robinson wrote passionately on social issues, sports, and family life, always encouraging people in his community to become active in politics and business. 
In 1964, Robinson co-founded Freedom National Bank of Harlem, a Black owned and operated bank created for the express purpose of financially aiding African American communities. In 1970, he founded the Jackie Robinson Construction Company, which sought to provide housing for low-income people.
In 1972, just twenty-five years after the start of the “Great Experiment,” Jackie Robinson died following his decade long battle with diabetes.
![](https://jackierobinson.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/GettyImages-151242301compressed-849x1280.jpg) NBC News -- MARCH ON WASHINGTON FOR JOBS AND FREEDOM 1968 -- Pictured: (l-r) Son David Robinson, baseball player Jackie Robinson, wife Rachel Robinson during the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom political rally in Washington, DC on August 28, 1963 -- (Photo by: NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images)
### “...Impact on Other Lives” 
Following Robinson’s death, Rachel Robinson became President of the Jackie Robinson Construction Corporation and renamed the company the Jackie Robinson Development Corporation. The company, responsible for building 1,600 units, specialized in building low-to-moderate income housing.
In 1973, with the assistance of Martin L. Edelman, Charles Williams and Franklin H. Williams, Mrs. Robinson honored her husband’s memory by establishing The Jackie Robinson Foundation (JRF). As Robinson’s living legacy, JRF provides four-year scholarships and a host of support services, including career guidance, internship placement, and leadership development opportunities to talented college students with limited financial resources. To date, 1,700 college scholars from 45 states who have attended 260 colleges and universities have benefitted from JRF’s Scholars Program. Jackie Robinson’s achievements have been honored by three Presidents: On March 26, 1984, President Ronald Reagan posthumously awarded him the Presidential Medal of Freedom; during the celebration of the 50th anniversary of Jackie Robinson’s historic entry into baseball, President William J. Clinton led a ceremony with Major League Baseball to honor his number “42” in perpetuity; and on October 10, 2003, the Congressional Gold Medal, the nation’s highest civilian award bestowed by Congress, was awarded posthumously to Jackie Robinson. President George W. Bush and the leadership of the United States Congress presented the award to Rachel Robinson during a ceremony held in the Capitol Rotunda on March 2, 2005.
### Baseball Career Stats
#### 1955 - World Series Champion
Jackie Robinson led the Brooklyn Dodgers to six World Series, with the team eventually winning the championship in 1955 against their cross-town rivals, the New York Yankees. Appearing in six games, Robinson went 4-for-22 with one double, one triple, one RBI, two walks and famously stole home base during game one of the series. 
#### 1962 - Hall of Fame Induction
Five years after retiring from baseball Robinson was elected to Baseball’s Hall of Fame. He and his co-inductee Bob Feller were the first, first-ballot electees by the Baseball Writer’s Association since the inaugural class in 1936. Among his many accomplishments were his .311 batting average, 197 stolen bases, scoring more than 100 runs a year, six times and his six All Star game appearances. 
#### 1997 – Number “42” Retired
On April 15, 1997, to mark the 50th anniversary of Jackie Robinson’s barrier breaking feat, MLB Commissioner Allan H. (Bud) Selig, Jr. joined by Rachel Robinson and President Bill Clinton, announced the retirement of Robinson’s number “42” throughout baseball in a nationally televised ceremony. Beginning in 2007, all MLB personnel wear the number “42” on April 15th to commemorate Robinson’s contributions to sport and society. 
#### 1947 - Rookie of the Year Award
#### 1947 - Rookie of the Year Award
Jackie Robinson won the inaugural Rookie of the Year Award during the trailblazing 1947 season in which he batted .297, scored 125 runs, hit 12 home runs and 31 doubles and led the league with 29 stolen bases while helping the Brooklyn Dodgers to the World Series. The Rookie of the Year Award was originally known as the J. Louis Comiskey Award and was a single award for the Major Leagues. In 1949, the award was expanded to include both the American League Rookie of the Year and the National League Rookie of the Year. In 1987, the award was renamed the Jackie Robinson Award. 
#### 1949 – Most Valuable Player Award 
Robinson garnered 264 of 336 points from the Baseball Writer’s Association and was named the 1949 National League’s Most Valuable Player. A dominant figure on the field that year, he played all 156 games, and was the National League’s batting and base stealing champion; was second in hits (203) runs batted in (124), doubles (38), triples (12); and third in runs scored (122). He would lead the Dodgers to the World Series where they lost to the Yankees in five games. 
#### 1955 - World Series Champion
Jackie Robinson led the Brooklyn Dodgers to six World Series, with the team eventually winning the championship in 1955 against their cross-town rivals, the New York Yankees. Appearing in six games, Robinson went 4-for-22 with one double, one triple, one RBI, two walks and famously stole home base during game one of the series. 
#### 1962 - Hall of Fame Induction
Five years after retiring from baseball Robinson was elected to Baseball’s Hall of Fame. He and his co-inductee Bob Feller were the first, first-ballot electees by the Baseball Writer’s Association since the inaugural class in 1936. Among his many accomplishments were his .311 batting average, 197 stolen bases, scoring more than 100 runs a year, six times and his six All Star game appearances. 
#### 1997 – Number “42” Retired
On April 15, 1997, to mark the 50th anniversary of Jackie Robinson’s barrier breaking feat, MLB Commissioner Allan H. (Bud) Selig, Jr. joined by Rachel Robinson and President Bill Clinton, announced the retirement of Robinson’s number “42” throughout baseball in a nationally televised ceremony. Beginning in 2007, all MLB personnel wear the number “42” on April 15th to commemorate Robinson’s contributions to sport and society. 
#### 1947 - Rookie of the Year Award
#### 1947 - Rookie of the Year Award
Jackie Robinson won the inaugural Rookie of the Year Award during the trailblazing 1947 season in which he batted .297, scored 125 runs, hit 12 home runs and 31 doubles and led the league with 29 stolen bases while helping the Brooklyn Dodgers to the World Series. The Rookie of the Year Award was originally known as the J. Louis Comiskey Award and was a single award for the Major Leagues. In 1949, the award was expanded to include both the American League Rookie of the Year and the National League Rookie of the Year. In 1987, the award was renamed the Jackie Robinson Award. 
#### 1949 – Most Valuable Player Award 
Robinson garnered 264 of 336 points from the Baseball Writer’s Association and was named the 1949 National League’s Most Valuable Player. A dominant figure on the field that year, he played all 156 games, and was the National League’s batting and base stealing champion; was second in hits (203) runs batted in (124), doubles (38), triples (12); and third in runs scored (122). He would lead the Dodgers to the World Series where they lost to the Yankees in five games. 
#### 1955 - World Series Champion
Jackie Robinson led the Brooklyn Dodgers to six World Series, with the team eventually winning the championship in 1955 against their cross-town rivals, the New York Yankees. Appearing in six games, Robinson went 4-for-22 with one double, one triple, one RBI, two walks and famously stole home base during game one of the series.

text:
### **1947: Debut with the Dodgers **
_In 1947, Jackie Robinson joined a Brooklyn Dodgers infield that included, from left, third baseman John “Spider” Jorgensen, shortstop Pee Wee Reese, and second baseman Eddie Stanky. (SABR-RUCKER ARCHIVE)_
The 1947 season began with most people expecting Jackie Robinson to take the field in a Dodgers uniform. He played for the Montreal Royals in 1946 and led the International League in batting average and runs scored. He also led the league’s second basemen in fielding percentage. His numbers clearly dispelled any doubts that a Black player was not talented enough to play in the majors.
Robinson’s road to the major leagues happened quickly in the spring of 1947. Between April 10 and April 15, Robinson went from being a Montreal Royal to Brooklyn Dodger. Although Robinson didn’t get a hit in his first regular-season game on April 15, his bunt in the seventh inning gave the Brooklyn faithful a preview of the type of baseball that Robinson would play. Robinson notched his first hit two days later and his first home run on April 18 when the Dodgers faced the Giants, their crosstown rivals.
But just as quickly as Robinson demonstrated his skills on the field, he faced racial slurs from opposing teams. His worst experience that season came from Ben Chapman and the Philadelphia Phillies. Led by their manager, the Phillies verbally abused Robinson when they faced the Dodgers for the first time in late April. Robinson later admitted that this game was the most difficult one of the 1947 season. But the Phillies’ actions only strengthened public support for Robinson and eventually Chapman asked Robinson to pose for a photograph at Shibe Park, falsely giving the impression that there were no tensions between them.
Robinson’s play on the field, including a 21-game hitting streak in the middle of the season, showed that he belonged in the National League. But that did not stop the harassment from opposing players. Perhaps the most notorious incident came on August 20, when the Cardinals’ Enos Slaughter spiked Robinson in the 11th inning.
Despite all of the adversity, Robinson persevered. He led the NL in stolen bases and finished second in runs scored. He eventually earned Rookie of the Year honors and came in fifth in the MVP voting. “Robinson is everything that Branch Rickey said he was when he came up from Montreal,” said Dixie Walker, one of the Dodgers who were originally unwilling to play with Robinson.
> _“I’d have to say at that point [Jackie Robinson] was the most extraordinary athlete I’d seen play the game. … And to make his debut at first base was really something.__I remember writing out the lineup card, didn’t think anything special of it. I just wanted to follow what Mr. Rickey and Durocher wanted. … Looking back, it was a part of history, but at that point I just wanted to get the season started before Mr. Shotton arrived. There were all sorts of photographers and newsreel cameras around home plate, all around the park. I felt the excitement. It was Opening Day and all that, but there was so much more going on._
> — Clyde Sukeforth, Brooklyn Dodgers acting manager on April 15, 1947
### **Spring Training in Havana**
When Jackie Robinson trained with the Montreal Royals in Daytona Beach, Florida, in the spring of 1946, Branch Rickey began to witness some of the racial confrontations he had feared. Trying to avoid as much of this as possible while preparing Robinson for his major-league debut, Rickey cited Cuba’s passion for baseball and its easy access from the mainland as two good reasons for the Brooklyn Dodgers to hold training camp in Havana in 1947.
While the White players were housed at the best resort in the city, the Hotel Nacional, Robinson and the Royals’ other Black players — Roy Campanella, Don Newcombe, and Roy Partlow — were taken instead to the Hotel Boston in “old” Havana. Robinson was irate, but went along with Rickey’s judgment.
Where the team stayed, however, made no difference to a number of White Dodgers who were nonetheless offended by Robinson’s presence. Led by Dixie Walker, the de facto leader of the team, the group included Hugh Casey, Carl Furillo, and Bobby Bragan and they started a petition to keep Robinson off the club. During a trip to Panama for a three-game series against the Royals, manager Leo Durocher caught wind of the uprising and exploded.
“I told them what they could do with their petition, and I don’t think I got much back talk on it,” he said years later. “I told the players that Robinson was going to open the season with us come hell or high water, and if they didn’t like it they could leave now and we’d trade them or get rid of them some other way. Nobody moved.”
As general manager, Rickey helped quell the discontent by trading veteran pitcher Kirby Higbe and star outfielder Dixie Walker to the Pittsburgh Pirates in separate deals. Dodgers management would stand behind Robinson until his teammates came around, albeit some more slowly than others.
label: Useful Information

text:
_Brooklyn Dodgers manager Leo Durocher and Jackie Robinson shake hands at El Gran Stadium in Havana, Cuba, during 1947 spring training. (SABR-RUCKER ARCHIVE)_
_Time Magazine cover of Leo Durocher on April 14, 1947 (TIME.COM)_
### **Leo Durocher’s Suspension**
Just before the 1947 season began, baseball commissioner Albert “Happy” Chandler suspended Brooklyn Dodgers manager Leo Durocher for a year. Chandler cited Durocher’s string of moral shortcomings: gambling debts, associations with known gamblers and nightlife figures, and a scandalous marriage with charges of adultery, bigamy, and contempt of court. Branch Rickey often said Leo possessed “the fertile ability to turn a bad situation into something infinitely worse,” but Leo seemed finally to have hit rock bottom this time.
Durocher’s suspension was shaping up as baseball’s “story of the year” before the season even started. Then Jackie Robinson took the field in Brooklyn. Led by interim manager Burt Shotton — a sort of anti-Durocher who preferred to wear civilian clothes in the dugout as opposed to a baseball uniform — the Dodgers won the National League pennant. They pushed the Yankees to a seventh game before losing the World Series. Leo and his troubles quickly receded into memories of spring training.
The 1947 season could have provided an opportunity for Durocher to shine along with Brooklyn’s new star. Instead, a _Time Magazine_ cover published a day before the season began would be the highlight of Durocher’s 1947. His unerring ability to find trouble and draw attention removed him from a landmark season in baseball history.
label: Useful Information

text:
### **A Royal at Ebbets Field**
Branch Rickey knew that Jackie Robinson was ready for the big leagues. Tested against Dodgers pitching in spring training, Robinson as a Royal hit .340 in 13 exhibition games between the two clubs in Havana, Cuba.[](https://sabr.org/jackie75/gamesproj/game/april-10-1947-jackie-robinson-royal-at-ebbets-field/#_edn9)
In his first appearance at Ebbets Field on April 10, just after Robinson popped into a double play attempting to bunt in the fifth inning, Arthur Mann, an assistant to Rickey _,_ handed out a brief announcement in the press box: “The Brooklyn Dodgers today purchased the contract of Jackie Roosevelt Robinson from the Montreal Royals.” The words were few, but the significance would resound beyond the game itself.
The following day would be a day long anticipated by both Rickey and Robinson. First, there would be the formality of Robinson signing a Brooklyn contract. In another exhibition game, Robinson would be wearing the Dodgers’ home white uniform for the first time against an opponent to become all too familiar in Robinson’s major-league career, the New York Yankees.
  * **Read more:[“April 10, 1947: A Royal at Ebbets Field,”](https://sabr.org/gamesproj/game/april-10-1947-jackie-robinson-royal-at-ebbets-field/) by Steven C. Weiner **
  * **Read more:[“April 11, 1947: Jackie Robinson debuts in a Dodgers uniform at Ebbets Field,”](https://sabr.org/gamesproj/game/april-11-1947-jackie-robinson-debuts-for-dodgers-at-ebbets-field/) by Steven C. Weiner **
label: Useful Information

text:
_Jackie Robinson enters the Brooklyn Dodgers clubhouse after his Montreal Royals contract was purchased by the major-league club on April 10, 1947. (NATIONAL BASEBALL HALL OF FAME LIBRARY)_
_Clyde Sukeforth, the Dodgers’ acting manager for Jackie Robinson’s debut on April 15, 1947, shrugged off his importance to the story, but Robinson didn’t. Near the end of his life, Robinson expressed his appreciation in a letter to Sukeforth at his home in Waldoboro, Maine:_
_“I consider your role, next to Mr. Rickey’s and my wife’s — yes, bigger than any other person with whom I came in contact. I have always considered you to be one of the true giants in this initial endeavour in baseball, for which I am truly appreciative. May you never find it convenient to underplay the role you played to make the Rickey-Robinson experiment a success.” (BARNEY STEIN / COURTESY OF KARL LINDHOLM)_
### **The First Game**
**April 15, 1947:** Jackie Robinson’s major league debut was more than just the first step in righting a historical wrong. It was a crucial event in the history of the American civil rights movement, the importance of which went far beyond the insular world of baseball.
Rumors of a sellout, along with a new team policy that opened up many grandstand tickets only on the morning of the game, may have discouraged some fans from attending. So a crowd of only 26,623 saw Robinson’s highly anticipated debut at Ebbets Field. The mainstream White newspapers in New York, including the _Brooklyn Daily Eagle_ and  _New York Times_ , briefly mentioned the historic nature of Robinson’s debut, but focused most of their coverage on the absence of Dodgers manager Leo Durocher and on Opening Day starting pitcher Joe Hatten.
Robinson was more comfortable at second base or shortstop, but on orders from the Dodgers he had been working out at first base all spring. That’s where he made the game’s first putout in the first inning, receiving a throw from fellow rookie Spider Jorgensen on Dick Culler’s ground ball to third base. Batting second in the Dodgers’ lineup, Robinson grounded out in his first at-bat against Braves right-hander Johnny Sain. He went 0-for-3, but his daring speed on the basepaths contributed to the Dodgers’ game-winning rally in the seventh inning. Speeding down the line after a sacrifice bunt, Robinson was hit in the back on an errant throw by the Braves’ first baseman and he later came around to score a run on Pete Reiser’s go-ahead double.
Instead of the suspended Durocher, the Dodgers’ acting manager for Robinson’s debut was Clyde Sukeforth — the same scout who met with Robinson in August 1945 and accompanied him to Brooklyn for the historic meeting in which Branch Rickey informed Robinson he wanted a “man with guts enough not to fight back.” Sukeforth managed the team’s first two games before handing over the reins to Burt Shotton for the rest of the season.
label: Useful Information

text:
### ?**Listen:**[SABR Oral History interview with Clyde Sukeforth (1994)](https://sabr.org/interview/clyde-sukeforth-1994/)
### **Celebration Tour Around the National League**
During the Brooklyn Dodgers’ first extended road trip of the 1947 season, Black baseball fans came out in droves to support Jackie Robinson. On the night of Robinson’s debut at Cincinnati’s Crosley Field, one observer estimated that there were 5,000 Black spectators. Another guessed 10,000. Some of those fans traveled more than 400 miles on a train that left Birmingham, Alabama, in the morning and picked up additional passengers as it rolled northward.
The scenes were similar all around the National League. On May 18, Wrigley Field set a paid-attendance record with 46,572, with upward of 20,000 unable to get into the ballpark. Dressed in their Sunday best, fans showed adoration and support for Robinson and cheered him for striking out at his first at-bat. In attendance that day were 12-year-old Allan “Bud” Selig, future commissioner of baseball, and future US Senator Herb Kohl.
Fourteen-year-old attendee Mike Royko, who became a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist, later wrote of Robinson’s Chicago debut, “The whites tried to look as if nothing unusual was happening, while the blacks tried to look casual and dignified. So everybody looked slightly ill at ease. For most, it was probably the first time they had been that close to each other in such great numbers.”

## [1.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) outline
Premium [car manufacturer](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%9E%90%EB%8F%99%EC%B0%A8%20%EC%A0%9C%EC%A1%B0%EC%82%AC "car manufacturer") under [the Volkswagen Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%20%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Volkswagen Group") in Germany . As a subsidiary, he has [Audi Sport](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20%EC%8A%A4%ED%8F%AC%ED%8A%B8 "audi sport") to produce [Lamborghini](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%9E%8C%EB%B3%B4%EB%A5%B4%EA%B8%B0%EB%8B%88 "Lamborghini") and its high -performance models. Pronunciation is "Audi" both German, English and Korean.
## [2.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) history
### [2.1.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) Early
The origin of the company is [Horch & Cie (Motorwagenwerke AG),](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%98%B8%EB%A5%B4%ED%9E%88 "Horch") which was founded in [Cologne](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BE%B0%EB%A5%B8 "Cologne") by motorsports enthusiast August Horch on November 14, [1899](https://en.namu.wiki/w/1899%EB%85%84 "1899") . Horch was originally an engineer at Mercedes-Benz, but left the company because Mercedes was too neglectful of racing.[[2]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-2)Afterwards, in [1909,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/1909%EB%85%84 "1909") August Horch was kicked out of the company **he founded under his own name** for being too passionate about motorsports , and he re-established the Horch Company (July 16, 1909), but was sued for violating the trademark law and no longer used the trademark Horch. It becomes unusable. Accordingly, Horch changed his name to 'Horch (to hear)'.[[3]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-3) Based on this, the company name was changed to Audi, which means to listen in Latin.[[4]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-4) (April 25, 1910), and thereafter focused the company's capabilities on developing luxury sedans.While most European auto manufacturers were struggling during the Great Depression in 1929, [US](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%AF%B8%EA%B5%AD "USA") automakers were targeting the European market. In order to overcome this crisis, Audi will launch 'Auto Union' by merger with [Horge](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%98%B8%EB%A5%B4%ED%9E%88 "Horch") , [Decabe](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8D%B0%EC%B9%B4%EB%B2%A0 "Decabe") (70%stake), and [Vanderer](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%B0%98%EB%8D%94%EB%9F%AC "Wanderer") .[[5]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-5) Here, AUDI = Auto Union Deutschland Ingolstadt has been changed (Autoion Doi Chilled Ingolstadt), and from then on, four circles have been used, which means four companies that have been merged.[[6]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-6) Afterwards, four circles were followed by an English language called AUTO Union. Therefore, even after the merger, it was a form of putting the logo of the company before the merger for a while, and in the 1949 circle after the end of World War II, the 'AUTO Union' was written as an uppercase. The current form of using **only** four circles began to use it when it merged the NSU below. [Mercedes-Benz](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") and Auto Union Racing titles, as well as the fastest records in history, have competed for the same record in history.The racing competition with the Audi and Daimler-Benz, which was made under the full support of the Nazi government at that time, remains the most mythical scene in automotive history. The lace cars of this era were exposed to a steel sheet, which had not been painted to reduce the weight, and the lace cars were driving high -speed as they were sunlight, reminiscent of the silver arrows, and the expression of "Silver Arrow" and the expression "silver silver."[During World War II,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%A0%9C2%EC%B0%A8%20%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%20%EB%8C%80%EC%A0%84 "World War II") Auto Union was **[a war criminal company](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%A0%84%EB%B2%94%EA%B8%B0%EC%97%85 "war crime company")** that produced and supplied military trucks using forced labor from prisoners at Leitmeritz concentration camp in [Nazi Germany](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%82%98%EC%B9%98%20%EB%8F%85%EC%9D%BC "nazi germany") . 4,500 prisoners lost their lives here. For a while, Audi, like other German war criminal companies, argued that forced labor was an unfortunate result of the war and that it was merely following Nazi instructions. However, when faced with a class action lawsuit and boycott in the United States in 1998, the [Gerhard Schröder](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EA%B2%8C%EB%A5%B4%ED%95%98%EB%A5%B4%ED%8A%B8%20%EC%8A%88%EB%A2%B0%EB%8D%94 "Gerhard Schroeder") government in 2000 declared 'Memory, Responsibility and the Future'. They established a compensation foundation for victims of forced labor called the Foundation (Stiftung Erinnerung, Verantwortung und Zukunft) and began to compensate for the damage through donations.However, many [factories](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%A5 "factory") were destroyed by [World War II](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%A0%9C2%EC%B0%A8%20%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%20%EB%8C%80%EC%A0%84 "World War II") , and most [factories](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%A5 "factory") were in [East German](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8F%99%EB%8F%85 "East Germany") territory, so they were confiscated by the authorities and faced crisis.[[7]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-7) In [1949](https://en.namu.wiki/w/1949%EB%85%84 "1949") , the company moved its headquarters to the Ingolstadt, [Bavaria](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%B0%94%EC%9D%B4%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B8 "Bavaria") . During this [period](https://en.namu.wiki/w/1958%EB%85%84 "1958") , Autoonion was focused on the front-wheel drive compact car lineup with Decabe and Auto [Union](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") [brands](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") .

Because of this , we have been criticized for **expensive Volkswagen** , but it does not bring Volkswagen's powertrain and platform except for small cars. Powertrain and platforms adopted for smaller cars or higher -level vehicles are all led by Audi or in collaboration with Porsche.[[19]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-19) Only.As such, it is currently [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") and shares some of the skeletons and systems, but it tends to be more advanced for **Audi** . In the case of small cars that share the platform with Volkswagen, [the Tiguan 2nd generation](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8B%B0%EA%B5%AC%EC%95%88#s-3.2 "Tiguan") and [the Audi Q3 2nd generation](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20Q3#s-2.2 "Audi Q3") platform, transmission, and even engine are shared, but in the case of Tiguan, the specifications are lowered to 184 horsepower and 300 nm torque. In the case of Audi Q3, 340 nm torque is 228 horsepower. In addition, the shift of the Audi Q3 is set relatively smooth, even in the same transmission, and it is natural that the overall quality is much better. When developing premium compact cars, they share various parts, platforms, and powertrains, but differentiate the merchandise only with the built -in or some powertrain settings is a development method that also enjoys other premium brands such as [Lexus](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A0%89%EC%84%9C%EC%8A%A4 "lexus") and BMW. [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") also shares the powertrain and platform of small models such as [BMW 1 Series](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW%201%EC%8B%9C%EB%A6%AC%EC%A6%88 "BMW 1 series") , [BMW 2 Series Gran Coupe](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW%202%EC%8B%9C%EB%A6%AC%EC%A6%88%20%EA%B7%B8%EB%9E%80%EC%BF%A0%ED%8E%98 "BMW 2 Series Gran Coupe") , [BMW X1](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW%20X1 "BMW X1") and [BMW X2](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW%20X2 "BMW X2") with [the mini](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%AF%B8%EB%8B%88 "mini") .At the end of September 2015, the worst [diesel gate](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%94%94%EC%A0%A4%EA%B2%8C%EC%9D%B4%ED%8A%B8 "dieselgate") in [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") was likely to hit the global brand image, but the sales performance in the United States, the direct party of the diesel gate, 4 compared to 2015 It has risen by about around,[[20]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-20) Even in major markets such as North America, Europe, and China, it has also seen even growth. Even after [diesel gates](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%94%94%EC%A0%A4%EA%B2%8C%EC%9D%B4%ED%8A%B8 "dieselgate") , Audi is still well -received as a premium company for local auto magazines such as Carwow, YouCAR, and AutoGEFühl and local automotive magazines such as Auto Zai Tong.At the end of 2024, Consumer Reports in the United States concluded that Audi's quality rose very much.[[21]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-21) Even in the past 10 years, it has been considered one step higher than [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") , which has increased quality rapidly through tremendous development .
### [3.1.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) [Korea](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8C%80%ED%95%9C%EB%AF%BC%EA%B5%AD "korea") market
In late 1987, when the imported car market was opened, Audi and [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") entered the market through [Hyosung Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%9A%A8%EC%84%B1%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Hyosung Group") . Before [the Korean](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8C%80%ED%95%9C%EB%AF%BC%EA%B5%AD "korea") imported car market became active, brand awareness was low and brand identity was lacking.[[22]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-22) Eventually, in [1997,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/1997%EB%85%84%20%EC%99%B8%ED%99%98%20%EC%9C%84%EA%B8%B0 "1997 foreign exchange crisis") due to the foreign exchange crisis, [Hyosung Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%9A%A8%EC%84%B1%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Hyosung Group") reorganized its Audi and [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") sales businesses, and sales were temporarily suspended.In 2000, Gojin Motors began operations as an official dealer, and sales resumed after three years. In October 2004, [Audi Volkswagen Korea](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%EC%BD%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%95%84 "Audi Volkswagen Korea") was established and the company switched to a direct sales system. In addition to Gojin Motors, the company operates 35 stores and 42 service centers nationwide through Taean Motors, Kolon Auto, etc.In the 2000s, the A6 and A8 were replaced with new models, and they stood out in the luxury car market with technology and product power that overwhelmed their competitors. As a result, reasonable price, performance, and design compared to [Mercedes-Benz](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") and [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW")[[23]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-23) , fresh image and [PPL](https://en.namu.wiki/w/PPL "PPL") strategy increased awareness. Sales volume is growing at a rate of more than 10% every year. Based on its image as an emerging luxury brand, it is breaking away from the classic competitive structure of [Mercedes-Benz](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") and [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") and securing its own buyer base. It is a brand that is so commonly seen in Korea that it is combined with Mercedes-Benz and BMW to be called Benbia.Audi's unique four-wheel drive system is called Quattro, and 30% of Audi's sales worldwide are Quattro (four-wheel drive), but in [Korea](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8C%80%ED%95%9C%EB%AF%BC%EA%B5%AD "korea") , 80% are Quattro. There is even an advertising copy in [Korean](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8C%80%ED%95%9C%EB%AF%BC%EA%B5%AD "korea") advertisements that says **, "Korea, Land of Quattro."**[[24]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-24) First of all, it can be seen as such because [Korea](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8C%80%ED%95%9C%EB%AF%BC%EA%B5%AD "korea") has four distinct seasons.[[25]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-25) It can be seen that the company achieved good results by utilizing the technological image of Quattro in marketing to compensate for its lineup focusing on luxury cars and its lack of identity compared to its competitors.Meanwhile, another problem with Audi is that although they [offer promotional](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%94%84%EB%A1%9C%EB%AA%A8%EC%85%98 "promotion") discounts almost all the time, the price of the car varies depending on the time of purchase depending on the promotional policy. Reflecting these customer complaints, the amount of discounts is decreasing after 2023, but in fact, models with small discounts and no discount promotions only at the beginning of the year often have no inventory to sell because they do not enter port at that time, and the majority of models that have inventory are in stock. There are still many discounts on car models.Of course, it is good for consumers to buy a cheaply car, but it is often discounted by 23% at the end of the year. These jagged promotion discount sales can cause the customer's distrust in the price reliability set by Audi Korea because it generates a gap with the nominal price of consumer prices. In addition, the price is different for each person who sells it. Based on this sales behavior, the domestic resistance survey resulted in the third place in the purchase stage of the three German companies. Of course, most premium imported car brands such as [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") , [Jaguar](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%9E%AC%EA%B7%9C%EC%96%B4\(%EC%9E%90%EB%8F%99%EC%B0%A8\) "재규어\(자동차\)") , [and Cadillac](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BA%90%EB%94%9C%EB%9D%BD "Cadillac") are offering discounts based on high discount rates, and [Mercedes](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") has been carrying out high discount policies, mainly for entry models such as C 200 and E 200. The premium imported car brands that rarely offer discounts are Volvo or Lexus, and the two brands cannot be discounted in fact, except for some models.On the other hand, electronic equipment malfunctions are also a problem that even competitors equipped with high-tech equipment such as Mercedes-Benz and BMW suffer from, and Volkswagen's image of frequent breakdowns in the United States overlaps even in Korea, and is somewhat exaggerated than the reality. In particular, cars in the early and mid-2000s came out with a lot of advanced equipment, but their durability and technology were insufficient, so many errors occurred. This is a problem with most vehicles in the 2000s, including the BMW E65/E66 (Bangle Generation) 7 Series. From the A8 D5 model and the A6 C8 model, the failure rate was corrected by reorganizing the internal design and electrical structure.Moreover, awareness of Audi models is lower than that of Mercedes-Benz or BMW. In the Benbia top 3, sales volume has fallen to one-third of that of BMW or Mercedes-Benz, and there are times when monthly sales are less than [Volvo](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%B3%BC%EB%B3%B4 "Volvo") . Of course, excluding [Tesla](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%85%8C%EC%8A%AC%EB%9D%BC "Tesla") , the sales volume is not so far that it will fall significantly compared to other imported car brands. This is because entry-level imported cars are not sold in Korea.As of 2022, Audi Volkswagen Korea has changed its name to [Volkswagen Group Korea](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9%EC%BD%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%95%84 "Volkswagen Group Korea") .
#### [3.1.1.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) Recent business status
In April 2012, the Audi Center, the largest integrated service center and showroom in Korea, opened. The service center has parking for 100 cars, 28 are on display, and a total of 36 work bays are installed, capable of handling at least 2,000 cars per month. Since it is 14,832㎡ (4,487 pyeong), visiting customers are encouraged to take a cart and have a look around.In 2015, Audi Korea returned the business rights to [Charmzone](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%B0%B8%EC%A1%B4 "Charm Zone") , an Audi dealer in Wirye New Town and [Songpa-gu](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%86%A1%ED%8C%8C%EA%B5%AC "Songpa-gu") , and [Kolon Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%94%EC%98%A4%EB%A1%B1%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Kolon Group") , one of [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") 's dealers , was selected. Kolon Co., Ltd., the holding company of [the Kolon Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%94%EC%98%A4%EB%A1%B1%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Kolon Group") , will be in charge of selling Audi in Kolon, and a separate corporation will be established to be in charge of sales and service of the Audi brand, separate from Kolon Global, an affiliate of the [Kolon Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%94%EC%98%A4%EB%A1%B1%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Kolon Group") , which is in charge of existing [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") dealers. · Agreed to operate. In foreign countries, so-called 'mega dealers' that deal with several brands in one dealership are common, and consumers can compare and touch various brands' models in one store. Kolon said that since Kolon is a holding company, it relies only on brand royalties for revenue, so it decided to start an imported car dealership in the process of seeking a new profitable business for the first time.Due to the effects of [Dieselgate,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%94%94%EC%A0%A4%EA%B2%8C%EC%9D%B4%ED%8A%B8 "dieselgate") sales have been completely plummeting since the second half of 2016. [View statistics](http://m.auto.danawa.com/auto/?Work=record&Brand=371&Month=2017-05-00&MonthTo= "http://m.auto.danawa.com/auto/?Work=record&Brand=371&Month=2017-05-00&MonthTo=") Until June 2016, they were selling about 2,600 to 2,800 units per month, which was a little lower than BMW and Benz, but it was still a decent level, but starting with a halving to 1,504 units in July 2016, sales plummeted to 476 units in August and have been steadily declining since. Finally, in March 2017, sales fell to 83 units, less than 100 units, and in April, **they didn't sell a single unit** . In May, they only sold 2 units. As the situation became more serious, they are considering selling the 13,000 units that were abandoned at Pyeongtaek Port due to the sales ban at a 30 to 40% discount in the third quarter of 2017 after consulting with the German headquarters. [#](http://m.newspim.com/news/view/20170622000085 "http://m.newspim.com/news/view/20170622000085") Netizens have already nicknamed this vehicle the 'Audi Pyeongtaek Port Edition'. However, it is not known whether actual discount sales will take place, as Audi Korea is consistently returning 1,000 to 1,500 of these vehicles to Audi headquarters every month.As of April 2020, they are selling the A3 Sedan 40 TFSI, A4 40 TFSI, A5 45 TFSI quattro Coupe/Cabriolet/Sportback, new A6 45 TFSI quattro, A6 40 TDI, A6 40 TDI quattro, A6 45 TDI quattro, A7 55 TFSI quattro, A8 L 55 TFSI quattro, facelifted Q7 45 TDI quattro, Q8 45 TDI quattro, Q8 50 TDI quattro, etc. Until a few months ago, they were only selling models at the clearance level, but the lineup is gradually normalizing again.Considering Audi's high promotional [discount](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%95%A0%EC%9D%B8 "discount") rate even as of 2021, the actual purchase price of Audi vehicles is much cheaper than that of [Mercedes-Benz](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") when compared on a same-class basis , so there is a clear price advantage, but distrust in quality is widespread and the value of the luxury brand is low. Because it has been seriously damaged, it is lagging behind in terms of sales volume at a level that is embarrassing to compare with Mercedes-Benz/BMW. In terms of domestic sales of imported cars in 2021, Mercedes-Benz ranked first, BMW ranked a close second, and Audi ranked third with a large gap of one-third of second place. Tesla is not included in these statistics. [※](https://hypebeast.kr/2022/1/mercedes-benz-is-the-best-selling-foreign-car-brand-in-korea-in-2021 "https://hypebeast.kr/2022/1/mercedes-benz-is-the-best-selling-foreign-car-brand-in-korea-in-2021")As of summer 2022, many lineups such as the Q4 e-tron, Q3 35 TDI, and Q3 35 TDI quattro have been introduced. In the 20s, when BMW implemented a policy of reducing promotions, Audi also began to reduce promotions **compared to normal years,** except for stock trays and vehicles not equipped with matrix LEDs before the model year change.In March 2023, Audi ranked 3rd in imported car sales, but in April 2023, it sold 473 units, a 79% decrease from the previous month, dropping to 10th place in imported car sales. This is lower than Japanese cars such as [Lexus](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A0%89%EC%84%9C%EC%8A%A4 "lexus") and [Toyota](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%86%A0%EC%9A%94%ED%83%80 "toyota") . In May, it sold 902 units, but fortunately, in June, it sold 1,347 units, a 49.3% increase from the previous month, barely maintaining four-digit sales. Looking at the first half of 2023, it sold 9,636 units, a 13.8% increase from the previous year, showing an increase in sales compared to the previous year. Looking at the rankings alone, BMW ranked 1st, Benz 2nd, Audi 3rd, Volvo 4th, and Lexus 5th in total imported car sales in 2023, the positions of the three major automakers remain the same, but the sales gap between BMW and Benz, which are 1st and 2nd respectively, continues to widen, and the sales gap with [Volvo](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%B3%BC%EB%B3%B4 "Volvo") , which has recently risen to 4th place through rapid growth in the domestic market, has narrowed to less than 1,000 units.[[26]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-26) It is in danger of losing its third place in imported car sales next year. Since its global sales are not much different from BMW and Benz, and in some regions it even has an advantage over BMW and Benz, the sluggish performance in the Korean market seems to be largely due to Audi Korea's missteps.Perhaps due to the above effects, Gojin Motors, Audi Korea's largest dealer, closed its Cheongju sales office in December 2023, and also closed its Suncheon sales office in April 2024. Fortunately, both locations maintain service centers. [#](https://n.news.naver.com/article/003/0012253631?sid=103 "https://n.news.naver.com/article/003/0012253631?sid=103") The Mokpo, Cheonan, and Suwon branches are also being considered for closure, but nothing has been announced yet.As of January 2024, imported car sales fell to 12th place, below the top 10 for the first time since Diesel Gate. [#](https://weekly.hankooki.com/news/articleView.html?idxno=7083963 "https://weekly.hankooki.com/news/articleView.html?idxno=7083963") The reason seems to be that there was very little salesable volume allocated domestically, and as a result, the discount rate was uncharacteristically low for Audi. Although it fell to 10th place in April 2023, it barely maintained 3rd place in overall sales in 2023. Therefore, what happens during the remaining period will determine whether Audi will be able to maintain its third place in imported car sales in 2024 or whether it will be pushed out by Volvo, which ranked fourth last year.According to the Korea Import Automobile Association's imported car registration data, the total number of registered vehicles was 9304 in 2024, with 15,551 Volvo and 13,969 Lexus, and even the seventh place in the imported car sales, which was even lower than Toyota's 9714 units. [#](https://www.mk.co.kr/news/business/11210511 "https://www.mk.co.kr/news/business/11210511")
## [4.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) characteristic
### [4.1.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) technology
Audi has the world's best automotive -related science and technology.The four -wheel drive Quattro (Quattro), the turodicel direct injection engine (TDI), the gasoline direct injection engine (FSI), and the aluminum space frame were invented.The slogan is VORSPRUNG DURCH TECHNIK in [German](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8F%85%EC%9D%BC%EC%96%B4 "German") , so it has focused on developing technology. For this reason, there is a tendency to think of it as Audi.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:external/lh...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/yFq4GQ6hneT1XLo8_u7r9BGHgWDB6SFrmxs-yqqTZEhyktsrOfcGMHSjA_bZgRYwhpEkeNjrgTceMVAtq05QffhFanoZAUe5rvrion4_h2qBNCtKrCluSUkZ44y7SXk13s-mipc1whddoKEhTnnwwA.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/cNlO1Bu%2BwQlWJFn0Kk8WO535fJmAqQIokp1lIgbtxygFO4USl%2FmNd%2Ffi5FWt1IUkYB3fUwjhQJihORqiPjmQ9c96Y%2B93%2F2rjGTSB0CnZE3b4ImGkNYml8zLudnb6ay5sIUis9isaJV%2Bnp4Yg4A77CMmOLpL1ISP67RznXw4zdl0%3D)[quattro](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C\(%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94\) "Quattro \(Audi\)") systemThe most representative technology is Quattro System [,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C\(%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94\) "Quattro \(Audi\)") an LSD -based mechanical regular [four -wheel drive](https://en.namu.wiki/w/4WD "4WD") released in 1980 . It is equipped with all models except for small cars, and Audi is a representative technology and brand that is represented by Quattro [.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C\(%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94\) "Quattro \(Audi\)") B8 type S4 model starts second generation[[27]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-27) [Quattro](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C\(%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94\) "Quattro \(Audi\)") has been adopted, and now he is using the sixth generation and Quattro Ultra.A commercial in 1986, in which [the Audi 100](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20100 "Audi 100") CS Quattro, the predecessor of the current A6, which introduced this technology, was filmed climbing the 37.5-degree inclined Pitkavuori ski jump located in Kaipola, Finland, caused a great sensation worldwide [.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%95%80%EB%9E%80%EB%93%9C "Finland")In [2005](https://en.namu.wiki/w/2005%EB%85%84 "2005") , 19 years later , 100 descendants, [A6](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20A6 "Audi A6") 4.2 Quattro, were dignified again. As you can see from [the making film](https://youtu.be/2Y5FOtSD6pg "https://youtu.be/2Y5FOtSD6pg") , it is a genuine A6 4.2 Quattro vehicle and is set to forcibly fix the Tiptronic [automatic transmission](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%9E%90%EB%8F%99%EB%B3%80%EC%86%8D%EA%B8%B0 "automatic transmission") for testing.[[28]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-28) The connected cable is also a safeguard for the situation and used to go down the slope. Of course, tires are winter spike tires.[[29]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-29)In addition, the [aluminum](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%8C%EB%A3%A8%EB%AF%B8%EB%8A%84 "aluminum") frame structure body named Audi Space Frame abbreviation ASF was unveiled at the Frankfurt Motor Show in 1993 and was first applied to the first-generation [Audi A8](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20A8 "Audi A8") , the successor to [the Audi V8](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20V8 "Audi V8") . This ASF technology received the EU Technology Award in 2008 as an innovative technology with high safety while reducing weight. As of 2012, Audi is the only maker that can mass-produce full aluminum bodies. Aluminum alloys are manufactured by Alcoa, an [American](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%AF%B8%EA%B5%AD "USA") manufacturer of aluminum products.[[30]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-30) It is supplied in the form of a steel plate, which is processed into an accurate shape using hydraulic forming technology, and then welded by skilled workers.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:external/ww...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/I1Wev2Iw11gyXB21iBJb1IzQnkbJdWkVn3TIPOJ0E9bkPFYWmQV5fZRlTC8hxlVh9yGHFYhzrmB0U3pN8ieJo4BSpxS8MKhYh9t-LrbjxWNqQG5D_naTmQzesgHzfqXEg7EYeFjr96qZav3L0_98tA.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/cNlO1Bu%2BwQlWJFn0Kk8WO535fJmAqQIokp1lIgbtxyj18B6H1owUlP1DW3espYdQ7QoGS2h%2BgwoSmBW67GWFKl918M3iW2VOYtEBgPUh5Rg%3D)Passenger diesel engines are also famous, TDI.[[31]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-31) Common rail diesel engines are voted the best diesel engines every year. The diesel engine used in [the Porsche Cayenne](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%89%90%20%EC%B9%B4%EC%9D%B4%EC%97%94 "porsche cayenne") is also Audi's TDI engine. It was shared with [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") , and TDI engines were supplied to [Chrysler](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%81%AC%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%EC%8A%AC%EB%9F%AC "Chrysler") , etc., which did not have passenger diesel engine technology.[[32]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-32)FSI, a direct injection engine with a gasoline engine[[33]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-33) And TFSI with turbocharger or supercharger on the FSI engine[[34]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-34) There is. Among them, the 2.0 TFSI engine is also an engine with excellent performance and efficiency.In the 2000s, [the hybrid](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%95%98%EC%9D%B4%EB%B8%8C%EB%A6%AC%EB%93%9C "hybrid") system, which was the core of the automotive market, was designed in the 1980s in Audi.[[35]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-35) It is not a slogan of 'progress through technology'.The background of Audi's 'progress through technology' was largely influenced by [Ferdinand Piech,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8E%98%EB%A5%B4%EB%94%94%EB%82%9C%ED%8A%B8%20%ED%94%BC%EC%97%90%ED%9E%88 "Ferdinand Piech") former chairman [of the Volkswagen Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%20%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Volkswagen Group") who moved from [Porsche](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%89%90 "porsche") to Audi in 1972 and current chairman of the board of directors of [the Volkswagen Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%20%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Volkswagen Group") .Pihi is the grandson of [Porsche](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%89%90 "porsche") 's founder, [Ferdinand Porsche](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8E%98%EB%A5%B4%EB%94%94%EB%82%9C%ED%8A%B8%20%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%85%B0 "Ferdinand Porsche") and a very promising engineer, and the most prominent CEO of the next [Porsche](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%89%90 "porsche") . However, he was pushed out of management disputes, and in 1972 he was virtually left as Audi's technology development department in [the Porsche](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%89%90 "porsche") Technology Development Department.However, Pihi has led the development of Audi's core technologies such as [Quattro](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C "quattro") System, Vegetable Zinc, TDI Engine, and ASF, and contributed to the current Audi's three major German premium brands. In the case of zinc plating, it is now a universal technology, but it was in the 1980s that Pihi introduced zinc plating and was a groundbreaking technology at the time. For reference, Audi's slogan, VORSPRUNG DURCH TECHNIK, is the motto of Piehi.And Piech took the success of Audi as a stepping stone and became the chairman of the parent company [Volkswagen Group](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%20%EA%B7%B8%EB%A3%B9 "Volkswagen Group") . The successor to Audi is Martin Winterkorn. Winterkorn then succeeded Piech as chairman of [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") . And [Porsche](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AC%EB%A5%B4%EC%89%90 "porsche") , which was trying to take over [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") by raising a lot of cash with the success of the Cayenne, was under financial pressure due to a sudden financial crisis, and was instead taken over by Fiech's [Volkswagen](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90 "Volkswagen") .Unlike [Mercedes-Benz,](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") which emphasizes durability and reliability and leaves a lot of output margin, and still uses a V12 [SOHC](https://en.namu.wiki/w/SOHC "SOHC") engine for flagship models such as Maybach, the powertrain is progressive along with [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") among the three [German](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8F%85%EC%9D%BC "germany") companies. am.The feature is that except for the C segment (A1, A3, TT), which uses [golf](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%20%EA%B3%A8%ED%94%84 "volkswagen golf") and [polo](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%8F%AD%EC%8A%A4%EB%B0%94%EA%B2%90%20%ED%8F%B4%EB%A1%9C "volkswagen polo") and platforms, all the engines are placed vertically even in front wheel drive. This is a traditional way from [DKW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%8D%B0%EC%B9%B4%EB%B2%A0 "Decabe") , one of the predecessors of Auto Union , and DKW was the world's first horizontal all -wheel drive car . This symmetrical front wheel drive structure, which places the engine vertically and placed the differential between the engine and the transmission, has a disadvantage that it is difficult to ensure that the engine is relatively in front of the engine, and it is difficult to secure the front and rear distribution, low rotational inheritance, and the large cooling space. Stable[[36]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-36) It also has a strong advantage of driving the driving characteristics and the large indoor space. Even after the development of Audi's proprietary patent, LSD -based mechanical four -wheel drive [Quattro](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C\(%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94\) "Quattro \(Audi\)") was developed above, the Quattro's aesthetic model is adopted by the qualified all -wheel drive rather than rear -wheel drive.The problem is that multitronic, the CVT transmission used by the vertical all -wheel drive model, was very infamous due to frequent failures. Due to numerous software errors and durability issues, Audi's preference for all -wheel drive models has been reduced, and in [the United States](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%AF%B8%EA%B5%AD "USA") , a group lawsuit has been subject to all vehicles that have caused multitronic problems for 10 years to be replaced by free transmissions. . In the end, Audi announced that in July 2014, it declared a subsequent discontinuance of multitronic, and the next [FF](https://en.namu.wiki/w/FF\(%EC%9E%90%EB%8F%99%EC%B0%A8\) "FF \(car\)") model announced that it would apply S-Tronic, a seven-speed dual-clutch transmission instead of multitronic. The S-Tronic was also pointed out in the durability problem in the beginning, but the latest S-Tronic is evaluated in the durability sector.The engine room is quite densely packed, and the poor maintainability is a disadvantage. In order to fix something, the engine has to be completely removed quite often, and the high repair costs resulting from this difficulty in maintenance are one of the reasons why Audi used cars depreciate more than other German premium brands. Another characteristic is that the weight of the vehicle is heavily weighted forward when the engine room is densely packed, so the weight of the front part of the vehicle is greatly reduced.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:external/te...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/N2Y40rAKP3M1m6HInVcD7LJ55Hsp9T0cvZqOdgBmwmJVGMRWEH4vGpuotykHjlZgxW1YnbXCPdYf6VeDHsxE0GwGKz_aAQhf8RHqZjAGf84QysP1Tg-UYPTe9luZv4YvrhkO4Z36CoqywjKmbv93XA.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/cNlO1Bu%2BwQlWJFn0Kk8WO535fJmAqQIokp1lIgbtxyh%2FJVY0Yx999yfDVt%2FvargdIidkx0LqWMrxNkcHNAinvPUzUWqPLl1RXR1W3WfwClzEe8CRZruL3n2Wk%2FrT4UXt)It is one of the auto manufacturers with very advanced autonomous driving technology.It was equipped with autonomous driving on the Audi A7 and RS7 and named 'Jack' and 'Robbie', respectively. The RS7 -based vehicle, the lobby, [recorded](http://techholic.co.kr/archives/23823 "http://techholic.co.kr/archives/23823") a speed of 240 km/h in Hokenheim Ring, Germany , breaking the record of autonomous cars. The peculiarity is that the car has succeeded in driving like a motor sports player by finding the best route called the record line on the circuit, and the error of the lap time is less than 1 second even if the track continues to drive. In [CES 2015](https://en.namu.wiki/w/CES#s-6 "CES") , Jack, a A7 -based vehicle, succeeded in operating directly from Silicon Valley to Las Vegas, where the venue is located. It is said that autonomous driving can only be made on roads that are not fully autonomous, but on roads that drive below 60 km/h.
### [4.2.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) design
Audi design is a streamlined and aggressive design.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:external/lh...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/EvkJNCis9AnyjL0Y92dLfvkDdSnT4dIWnOEZqhvpHz8kFMR21yyGTA0du_IK936nmmplrnLFZjXHJ42U9NSbGfRg1-N-AjdB5QA0XrKvJz4O--RFjd7kCk1YGQ0-ysrwA4a9GwBplbFWTX0eiD3phw.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/cNlO1Bu%2BwQlWJFn0Kk8WO535fJmAqQIokp1lIgbtxyiq9APp0o5Mk%2FURWu%2Ff2JowN%2BNXpDaN4e%2B55BcTeWyZ3Q69L4vqOYRvPCYcj9QgVZznWWwDsGlw9UBpx0JkDXop)Although it was very conservative in the past, the start of design changes was Audi's TT (first generation), which was first launched in 1999. There is information that many people in Korea are wrong here, and it is information that [Peter Schreier](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%ED%94%BC%ED%84%B0%20%EC%8A%88%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4 "peter schreyer") has designed. Peter Schreier is only a mass production sketch of TT, but the overall concept of the first generation TT is the work of Freeman Thomas. It is never a person who has brought about a large transformation to Audi design. However, at this time, there was still a gentle design, so I was nicknamed the princess of the Autoban.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:external/lh...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/DcJH2P9mGc64Y4snF9NZDhZOOyhoX6_yfJRY7UUZrd8DH6IYq_PZis4X3RoPMFpUWm_jyXC57JROgHFoKzjVszXQBPQkRy-3GRyRMrAm0ps1GS70cFVIfs5W4WoS1Iq3yoeWzk14Rj1WpmdFX3sBOQ.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/BP86DRZdLBCWAb7lNRSOo0QzQwiskiDmtGHzFEeWdQ%2F%2BGNvN9fyRbAhZg6CCVkP90PbFuwRoKinXwegBwia41siMtpRgkouNkPX0ITWBBuGjsB05Rj%2FSNmO179gVu3xM)In 2003, chief designer [Walter de Silva](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%B0%9C%ED%84%B0%20%EB%93%9C%20%EC%8B%A4%EB%B0%94 "Walter de Silva") 's 'Single Frame', a design in which the central part of the front bumper was unified was unveiled. This 'single frame' has been applied to all Audi models since 2004 and is evaluated as a design that firmly establishes Audi's identity and family look. All current Audi design features are designs that continue from [the Walter de Silva](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%B0%9C%ED%84%B0%20%EB%93%9C%20%EC%8B%A4%EB%B0%94 "Walter de Silva") system.
It was well received in terms of design, but at the same time, the design of the entire car was so the same that it was criticized. However, automakers are currently designing very similarly with family look as in the past.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:external/7c...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/qP2ifEsBlZGyBJcIOQo2D2-08qS-mRBbeqiQ3exKBLhJi_w9sBl-eCVYQ4CyNNi3xLNKcKv_6stPr6dmRqtvJEOC0BZhRPPh0LnLW1q7HUeangVOlj4RzCIXswclu-uWgEDTd7rz2_8H1ibgOVNMOQ.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/BP86DRZdLBCWAb7lNRSOo0QzQwiskiDmtGHzFEeWdQ%2B2czZxErrSjZzK072Mv0qEzL7Qv5ODSIc%2F1zKsGpnY%2F3k4qn4%2FcGC3S%2Fzp76a7rdG6WpsEnAa7nA%2FSR7IpN7lavQ9nmHOthOOgIUTFmf8fhQ%3D%3D)Audi maintained this until the mid -2000s and promised to eliminate this criticism from his design, and presented the future direction of his design and Audi in the concept car prologue unveiled at the 2014 Los Angeles Auto Show.![](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94)![File:2023 Audi R...](https://i.namu.wiki/i/pkU58GJ3catJ4jsxIZLLETPy7Z8CTIXe9Xo7TO5let3X1PrSyJ7AjYGoy9-Rswod5zSMewMUFZJayWfreSGqgVHrtIYisADviqG9N6SfsHv1FQqiOExJyqGyrCKncokpfiTs_ywhh13PTZPn9L9K9w.webp)[](https://en.namu.wiki/jump/BP86DRZdLBCWAb7lNRSOoz3nfnvNuPKz4M%2FpmzQYg4Qo1wjfYdhVQMBeL4a9iWqWrvx%2BWIyU9iGFbMGkS%2BVELA%3D%3D)See [the Audi R8](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20R8 "Audi R8") document.
### [4.3.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) headlamp
It is no exaggeration to say that the headlight technology is the best. This is a **lighting business department** . It is the second after [the Quattro®](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%BD%B0%ED%8A%B8%EB%A1%9C\(%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94\) "Quattro \(Audi\)") , and the design is beautiful enough to be called Audi's identity. The world's first full LED lamp was applied through the R8[[37]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-37) Since then, it has been applied to all models quickly.[[38]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-38) In particular, the [LED](https://en.namu.wiki/w/LED "LED") lamp is small, light, and enables free lamp design. As a result, Audi further emphasizes sporty design through aggressive lamp design.
In particular, [the LED](https://en.namu.wiki/w/LED "LED") that resembles the under eye line shown in the 4th generation [Audi A4](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94%20A4#s-2.2.1 "Audi A4") [Daytime running lights](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%84%EC%A3%BC%ED%96%89%EB%93%B1 "daytime running lights") were so highly praised that they were considered revolutionary in automobile design at the time.The V-shaped bending LED shape was another Audi family look and was also a factor that had a positive impact on sales. Starting with Audi, [Mercedes-Benz](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EB%A9%94%EB%A5%B4%EC%84%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%8A%A4-%EB%B2%A4%EC%B8%A0 "Mercedes-Benz") and [BMW](https://en.namu.wiki/w/BMW "BMW") are also trying to express each brand's identity through daytime running lights. For example, BMW has started showing its famous angel eyes, and Mercedes-Benz mainly draws eyeliner on its lamps. Recently, many brands have come up with unique LED lamp designs, and BMW is following closely behind, so there is nothing special about it, but it has consistently stood out at the number one level in this field with the OLED tail lamp concept, matrix high beam assist system, and laser light.For reference, like Audi, which tests technology at Le Mans, lighting technology is also tested in races before release. LED was introduced through the R10 race car in 2006,[[39]](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#fn-39) The matrix high-beam assist system, laser lamps and OLED tail lamps were unveiled through the R18 race car.However, the A8 facelift model that appeared in 2021 is equipped with digital matrix LED headlamps that replace laser headlamps. The remaining car models equipped with laser headlamps are also removing the laser headlamps one by one, and competitor BMW is also removing the laser headlamps and replacing them with adaptive LED headlamps.
### [4.4.](https://en.namu.wiki/w/%EC%95%84%EC%9A%B0%EB%94%94#toc) Welcome sound
